Description:
Detects driver load of the System Informer tool

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - System Informer Driver Load
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where image_loaded like '%\systeminformer.sys' and (hashes like '%sha256=8b9ad98944ac9886ea4cb07700e71b78be4a2740934bb7e46ca3b56a7c59ad24%' or hashes like '%sha256=a41348bec147ca4d9ea2869817527eb5cea2e20202af599d2b30625433bcf454%' or hashes like '%sha256=38ee0a88af8535a11efe8d8da9c6812aa07067b75a64d99705a742589bdd846d%' or hashes like '%sha256=a773891acf203a7eb0c0d30942fb1347648f1cd918ae2bfd9a4857b4dcf5081b%' or hashes like '%sha256=4c3b81ac88a987bbdf7d41fa0aecc2cedf5b9bd2f45e7a21f376d05345fc211d%' or hashes like '%sha256=3241bc14bec51ce6a691b9a3562e5c1d52e9d057d27a3d67fd0b245c350b6d34%' or hashes like '%sha256=047c42e9bba28366868847c7dafc1e043fb038c796422d37220493517d68ee89%' or hashes like '%sha256=18931dc81e95d0020466fa091e16869dbe824e543a4c2c8fe644fa71a0f44feb%' or hashes like '%sha256=b4c2ef76c204273132fde38f0ded641c2c5ee767652e64e4c4071a4a973b6c1b%' or hashes like '%sha256=640954afc268565f7daa6e6f81a8ee05311e33e34332b501a3c3fe5b22adea97%' or hashes like '%sha256=251be949f662c838718f8aa0a5f8211fb90346d02bd63ff91e6b224e0e01b656%' or hashes like '%sha256=e2606f272f7ba054df16be464fda57211ef0d14a0d959f9c8dcb0575df1186e4%' or hashes like '%sha256=3a9e1d17beeb514f1b9b3bacaee7420285de5cbdce89c5319a992c6cbd1de138%')
